text: When It Was Dark is a lost 1919 British silent drama film directed by Arrigo Bocchi and starring Manora Thew, Hayford Hobbs and George Butler.Low p.477 It is an adaptation of the novel of the same title by Guy Thorne. ==Cast== * Manora Thew as Gertrude Hunt * Hayford Hobbs as Reverend Basil Gortrie * George Butler as Constantin Sharke * Charles Vane as Professor Llewellyn * Evelyn Harding as Princess Lontaine * Bert Wynne as Harold Spence * Peggy Patterson as Helen Byars * Judd Green as Father Riposi * Arthur Walcott as Governor ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. History of the British Film, 1918-1929.
